job description:
Job Description:

This position will perform deep dives on Amazon shortage and penalty deductions to identify root causes. Once identified, actions plans will be created to drive process improvements to limit inbound deductions and increase paybacks. Actions will require cross-functional leadership with credit, customer supply chain, customer service, logistics, and transportation. Scope will begin with the U.S. and be applied to North America.

Need to be very detail oriented, solid analytical skills working with a lot of data, with experience in excel. Any previous deduction experience, customer supply chain, or Amazon experience is a plus. Experience working with cross-functional teams are helpful.
